plugin.name: smpte
plugin.description: Apply the standard SMPTE transitions on video images

element.name: smpte
element.description: Apply the standard SMPTE transitions on video images
element.author: Wim Taymans <wim.taymans@chello.be>

element.name: smptealpha
element.description: Apply the standard SMPTE transitions as alpha on video images
element.author: Wim Taymans <wim.taymans@gmail.com>
